EmailTemplate.name: ITM.ITM Webinar Email.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join NCR for the latest ITM Webinar – Wednesday, March 31, 2021
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Date: Wednesday, March 31, 2021 2 p.m. - 3:30 p.m. ET Looking to extend the reach of your financial institution? Then consider Enhanced Self-Service (ESS) to turn your ATM into a digital endpoint. By integrating to your core, ESS enables more routine transactions, a better experience and improved operational efficiency. In this webinar learn more about NCR Interactive Services showcased through various deployment strategies. With social distancing the 'new normal’, NCR's ITM are helping financial institutions stay close to their customers. Join us on Wednesday, March 31 at 2 p.m. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
